title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Flipped Learning-Based Science Task Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain core concepts from pre-learning video materials provided through flipped learning at a rate of 90% or higher.
Learners can apply scientific knowledge acquired in project-based lessons to real-world job situations and propose problem-solving strategies.
Learners can deepen and expand their learning content through peer feedback and instructor support, applying it to work processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
